entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @ryanstruyk @maddow The number of Americans dead from COVID-19 now exceeds that of the Vietnam war, with Agent Orange being sprayed in both Hanoi and the White House.
